$metadata.name: FastTrack Spacing Tokens
notes: Used for gaps, margins, paddings, and layout spacing

2xs.$description: Micro spacing — icon inner padding, tight inline elements

xs.$description: Extra small — compact element gaps, tag padding

sm.$description: Small — default inline gaps, form element spacing

md.$description: Medium — default content gaps, card padding

lg.$description: Large — section spacing, between card groups

2xl.$description: Double extra large — major page section divisions

3xl.$description: Triple extra large — page-level vertical spacing
